fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can't be jailed or affected by similar abilities.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Phase a player {who is a Coven member} out at night, roleblocking them and {each non-}attacking {player targetting} them. {If they're attacked that night, up to one random attacker is redirected to another random non-Coven player other than themself. You may self-target.}
- **Cleave** during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you have the Necronomicon, you may Cleave any number of times instead of only once.
